teiHeader.encodingDesc: Full description provided in accompanying thesis 'Methodology' section

objectDesc.note: A Blegywryd text with some missing and some damaged pages. There is additional material at the end of the manuscript. This manuscript was at the Massachusetts Historical Society Library, Boston, for some years.

fileDesc.editionStmt: Bespoke encoding of text drawn from Luft, Peter and Smith (2013), ‘Rhyddiaith gymraeg 1300-1425’.URL:http://www.rhyddiaithganoloesol.caerdydd.ac.uk.

teiHeader.profileDesc: This encoding represents the text of Cyfraith Hywel referred to as Boston in the Blegywryd redaction.
